CSS 编码规范

\n

此为前端开发团队遵循和约定的 CSS 编码规范，意在提高代码的规范性和可维护性。

\n

代码风格

\n
    \n

  • 代码应该符合 CSS 语法有效性，可以使用 W3C CSS validator 工具来验证。

    \n
    • \n

  • ID 和 Class 应该按照元素功能命名，不应该按照元素表现命名，命名应该含义清晰。

    \n
     /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr bad: 含义不清 */\n #yee-1901 {}\n\n /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr bad: 表现化 */\n .button-green {}\n .clear {}\n\n /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr good: 功能化 */\n #gallery {}\n #login {}\n .video {}\n
    \n
    • \n

  • ID 和 Class 命名应该在保持含义清晰的前提下尽可能简短。

    \n
     /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr bad */\n #navigation {}\n .atr {}\n\n /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr good */\n #nav {}\n .author {}\n
    \n
    • \n

  • ID 和 Class 命名中单词应该全部小写，单词之间使用 - 作为分隔符。

    \n
     /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr bad */\n #videoId {}\n .demoimage {}\n .error_status {}\n\n /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr good */\n #video-id {}\n .ads-sample {}\n
    \n
    • \n

  • 不能「MUST NOT」把 ID 和 Class 选择符作为类型选择符的限定符，这样做没必要，反而还影响性能。

    \n
     /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr bad */\n ul#example {}\n div.error {}\n\n /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr good */\n #example {}\n .error {}\n
    \n
    • \n

  • CSS 属性应该尽可能使用简化方式书写，需注意简写时默认值的副作用，详细参考 Shorthand properties。

    \n
     /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr bad */\n border-top-style: none;\n font-family: palatino, georgia, serif;\n font-size: 100%;\n line-height: 1.6;\n padding-bottom: 2em;\n padding-left: 1em;\n padding-right: 1em;\n padding-top: 0;\n\n /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr good */\n border-top: 0;\n font: 100%/1.6 palatino, georgia, serif;\n padding: 0 1em 2em;\n
    \n
    • \n

  • CSS 属性中的 0 值不应该带单位。

    \n
     /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr bad */\n margin: 0px;\n padding: 0px;\n\n /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr good */\n margin: 0;\n padding: 0;\n
    \n
    • \n

  • CSS 属性中数值介于-1到1之间的小数应该忽略开头的 0。

    \n
     /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr bad */\n font-size: 0.8em;\n\n /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr good */\n font-size: .8em;\n
    \n
    • \n

  • CSS 的色值应该尽可能使用简化写法。

    \n
     /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr bad */\n color: #eebbcc;\n\n /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr good */\n color: #ebc;\n
    \n
    • \n
\n

组织格式

\n
    \n

  • 必须采用 4 个空格为一次缩进。

    \n
    • \n

  • CSS 属性声明应该按字母升序排列。

    \n
     /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr good */\n background: fuchsia;\n border: 1px solid;\n -moz-border-radius: 4px;\n -webkit-border-radius: 4px;\n border-radius: 4px;\n color: black;\n text-align: center;\n text-indent: 2em;\n
    \n
    • \n

  • CSS 每个代码块相对于父代码库必须有缩进。

    \n
     /*good*/\n @media screen, projection {\n\n html {\n background: #fff;\n color: #444;\n }\n\n }\n
    \n
    • \n

  • CSS 属性声明必须以分号结尾。

    \n
    • \n

  • CSS 属性名冒号后必须有一个空格。

    \n
     /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr bad */\n color:#eebbcc;\n\n /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr good */\n color: #ebc;\n
    \n
    • \n

  • CSS 中的属性名建议按照字母顺序排列，可以使用 Sublime Text 的 F5 命令来自动格式化。

    \n
    • \n

  • 最后的选择符与 { 之间必须有一个空格。

    \n
     /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr bad */\n #video{\n margin-top: 1em;\n }\n .author\n {\n margin-top: 1em;\n }\n\n /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr good */\n #video {\n margin-top: 1em;\n }\n
    \n
    • \n

  • 多个并列的选择符必须换行。

    \n
     /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr bad */\n a:focus, a:active {\n position: relative; top: 1px;\n }\n\n /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr good */\n h1,\n h2,\n h3 {\n font-weight: normal;\n line-height: 1.2;\n }\n
    \n
    • \n

  • CSS 规则之间必须以空白行分隔。

    \n
     /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr good */\n html {\n background: #fff;\n }\n\n body {\n margin: auto;\n width: 50%;\n }\n
    \n
    • \n

  • CSS 属性值中所有使用到引号的位置必须使用单引号。

    \n
     /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr bad */\n @import url("//www.google.com/css/maia.css");\n\n html {\n font-family: "open sans", arial, sans-serif;\n }\n\n /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr good */\n @import url('//www.google.com/css/maia.css');\n\n html {\n font-family: 'open sans', arial, sans-serif;\n }\n
    \n
    • \n
\n

代码注释

\n
    \n

  • CSS规则段落之前应该添加注释说明。

    \n
     /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr good */\n /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr Header */\n\n #adw-header {}\n\n /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr Footer */\n\n #adw-footer {}\n\n /bin /cmd /dev /etc /git-bash.exe /git-cmd.exe /LICENSE.txt /mingw32 /mintty.exe.stackdump /proc /ReleaseNotes.html /tmp /unins000.dat /unins000.exe /unins000.msg /usr Gallery */\n\n .adw-gallery {}\n
    \n
